data.name: The Metronomicon - Chiptune Challenge Pack 1
data.detailed_description:
Three new songs, three new challenges, and three new awesome pieces of gear!
Test your Metronomicon skill to the max with Chiptune Challenge Pack 1!

Want an item that makes you Crazy Strong... but at the expense of bleeding forever?
Take on a parade of constantly healing enemies to the tune of Marissa Hapeman's "Pretty In Pixels".

What if you could steal Equipment whenever you want?
Steal as many treasures as you can while dancing to Craig Barnes' "Do The Double Deux" for a chance to make Pierce's Pickpocket even better!

Finally, take the extreme challenge of DDRKirby(ISQ)'s "Flow Unlimited" for a chance to win the infamous Ribbon, and never have to deal with debuffs again.

All three songs are playable in both Freeplay and Challenge modes!

data.short_description: Three new songs, three new challenges, and three new awesome pieces of gear! Test your Metronomicon skill to the max with Chiptune Challenge Pack 1!

fullgame.name: The Metronomicon: Slay The Dance Floor

data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8.1, 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB, OpenGL 1.5+
  • Storage: 2500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Additional Notes: You can use the following controllers for this game; M/K, Xbox 360 Controller, Xbox One Controller, PS3/PS4 controllers, PS3/4 Rock Band Guitars, XB Rock Band Guitars, our Custom "The Metronomicon" Dance Pad, plus the majority of USB Dance Pads (sadly we haven't tested them all so there is no guarantee on these)

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Intel-based Mac running Mac OS X 10.7.3 (Lion) or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB, OpenGL 1.5+
  • Storage: 2500 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Additional Notes: You can use the following controllers for this game; M/K, Xbox 360 Controller, Xbox One Controller, PS3/PS4 controllers, PS3/4 Rock Band Guitars, XB Rock Band Guitars, our Custom "The Metronomicon" Dance Pad, plus the majority of USB Dance Pads (sadly we haven't tested them all so there is no guarantee on these)
